name: team_groupings
description: List teams in smaller conceptual groupings

name: breadcrumbs
description: When enabled, show breadcrumbs, a navigational tool to show position in the site map. When disabled, do not show breadcrumbs, but instead show a page title in a header tag.

name: cms_content
description: When enabled, show content management system pages.  When disabled, show a note indicating that the site is not ready to unveil to the public.

name: privacy_settings
description: When enabled, allow users to see and set privacy settings in their profile.  When disabled, default privacy settings will be 'coordinators only'.

name: friends
description: When enabled, allow users to make another user their friend, and allow a user's friends to see their contact info.

name: labs
description: When enabled, show a new 'labs' link in the top strip, allowing people to turn experimental features on and off in a central location.  When disabled, features must be enabled by using URLs only.
